transArray.content: The lobby of the hotel is clean and full of design. The service at the front desk is warm. The check-in process is very fast. The business at the front desk is very professional. The bath products in the room are great, the sanitation is very clean, the space in the room is well utilized, and the auntie in the room is very polite. I will say hello when we meet. I was pleasantly surprised that the takeaway I ordered was delivered to me by a robot. The free laundry service on the first floor is great, and the check-out speed is also very fast. I will come to this store often
